content: yarn in back waffle stitch pattern in the same way http //knitpurl- sl as if to purl 4 rounds hunter com/blog/ p=306 sm slip marker rounds 1 2 p1 slwyb *p2 *k2 k2tog tbl sl the 3 sts from the slwyb repeat from * until 1 st st s stitch es right needle back to the left needle before marker p1 sm repeat from * all the way around tbl through the back loop rounds 3 4 knit around break yarn and sew ends together this part is a little fiddly but well repeat rounds 1 4 20 more worth it times on the other edge pick up and knit repeat rounds 1 2 once more 318 sts at this point you have a few repeat directions for bind off decisions to make…3 options are using an applied i-cord presented below you decide what works for you for all 3 options option 1 weave in ends a word about blocking i usually block every- bind off using standard bind off thing but i did not block this cowl that isn t too stretchy if you choose to block it your dimensions may change option 2 if you have more yarn continue repeating rounds 1 4 ending with rounds 1 2 bind off using standard bind off that isn t too stretchy page 2
